head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SIMON, FREDERICK KRAMER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SIMON, FREDERICK KRAMER

block.p: SIMON--Frederick Kramer, 66, of Havertown, PA, passed away on January 8, 2007. He is survived by his beloved wife, Tina, his cherished father, Stanley Simon, his children Laura and Dale Cronin, Lewis and Karen Simon, and Carl Simon, his grandsons, Patrick and Joshua Cronin. Services Wednesday 10:30 am, January 10th at ''The Riverside'' 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
